TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataListDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner

summary.span: 扩展 Web 服务器控件的设计时行为。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 该代码重写方法以显示五个点边框紫色启用控制。The code overrides the method to display a five-point border that is purple if the control is enabled. [!code-csharp[DataGriddesigner_Sample2#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/CS/SimpleGridView.cs#10)] [!code-csharp[DataGriddesigner_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/CS/SimpleGridView.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGriddesigner_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/VB/SimpleGridView.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用关联设计器控件。The following code example shows how to use the to associate the designer with the control. [!code-csharp[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/CS/SimpleGridView.cs#6)] [!code-vb[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/VB/SimpleGridView.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 为 则既释放托管资源又释放非托管资源；为 则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; to release only the unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象占用的非托管资源并（可选）释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`disposing`是`true`、方法释放所有资源由托管对象持有此对象引用。When `disposing` is `true`, the method releases all resources held by the managed objects that this object references.

para.span: 方法可以由其他对象调用多次。

span.span: The method can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写它，请确保不引用对象已释放在以前调用。

span.span: When overriding it, ensure that you do not reference objects that have been disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和方法，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about the and methods, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String
public: override System::String ^ GetDesignTimeHtml();

summary.span: 获取设计时用于表示 控件的 HTML。

span.span: Gets the HTML used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 设计时用于表示 控件的 HTML。

span.span: The HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法。The following code example shows how to override the method. 将如果设计图面上的控件的外观更改控件的属性是`true`。It alters the appearance of the control on the design surface if the control's property is `true`. 该代码使用`Try...Catch...Finally`语法来执行以下操作：The code uses `Try...Catch...Finally` syntax to do the following: - `Try`部分更改控件的属性的值。The `Try` section changes the values of the properties of the control. - `Catch`部分捕获任何异常，并将其发送至方法。The `Catch` section catches any exceptions and sends them to the method. - `Finally`部分将属性设置为其原始值。The `Finally` section sets the properties to their original values. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/CS/SimpleGridView.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/VB/SimpleGridView.vb#2)]
